title: Hours
body: Hi,I was wondering where can I see how many hours I played League,can somebody please tell me

replies.body: Finding out how long a summoner has played is not currently a feature that's available.  We don't share information like this as it can be essential towards helping players with recovering their accounts in cases that becomes necessary.  A good way I like to share how long I've played is by how many seasons I've participated in!

I realize this was a year ago, but I've been searching since seeing the patch notes. Is there a way we can make a request to you all fine folks at Riot HQ to receive that information? I suppose we could just wait a week... but I don't know many League players that have that sort of patience!

Thank you! :)
